Public NotInheritable Class Polygon Inherits Shape
public ref class Polygon sealed : System::Windows::Shapes::Shape

summary.span: 繪製多邊形，也就是形成封閉圖形的一系列相連線條。

span.span: Draws a polygon, which is a connected series of lines that form a closed shape.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個物件是類似於物件，這個物件必須是封閉的圖形。This object is similar to the object, except that this object must be a closed shape. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立項目並設定其屬性，使用程式碼。The following example shows how to create a element and set its properties by using code. [!code-cpp[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolygon](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/CPP/ShapesProcedural.cpp#shapesproceduralpolygon)] [!code-csharp[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolygon](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/Csharp/ShapesProcedural.cs#shapesproceduralpolygon)] [!code-vb[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolygon](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/VisualBasic/ShapesProceduralVB.vb#shapesproceduralpolygon)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 取得或設定 列舉型別 (Enumeration)，這個列舉型別指定圖案的內部填滿規則。

span.span: Gets or sets a enumeration that specifies how the interior fill of the shape is determined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉值會決定 「 「 向內程度 」 的圖形上的點。The enumeration value determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape. 它從點朝任意方向繪製光線，然後計算從指定的形狀與光線相交的路徑片段的數目。It draws a ray from the point to infinity in any direction and counts the number of path segments from the specified shape that the ray crosses. 如果數值為奇數，則點即; 內如果是偶數，則點即外。If the number is odd, the point is inside; if it is even, the point is outside. 列舉值會決定 「 「 向內程度 」 的圖形上的點。The enumeration value determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape. 它從點朝任意方向繪製光線，，然後檢查圖案線段與光線相交的地方。It draws a ray from the point to infinity in any direction and then examines the places where a segment of the shape crosses the ray. 以計數為零起始，加入一個每次從左到右光線區段，並減去每個時間路徑光線由右至左。Starting with a count of zero, it adds one each time a Segment crosses the ray from left to right and subtracts one each time a path segment crosses the ray from right to left. 計算交會後，如果結果為零後，該點即在路徑外。After it counts the crossings, if the result is zero, the point is outside the path. 否則就在路徑內。Otherwise, it is inside. ![填滿規則圖例](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "填滿規則圖例")![Fill rule illustration](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "Fill rule illustration") FillRule 範例FillRule Example ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

Public Shared ReadOnly FillRuleProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 取得或設定包含多邊形各頂點的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection that contains the vertex points of the polygon.

value.span: 描述多邊形頂點之 結構的集合。

span.span: A collection of structures that describe the vertex points of the polygon.

value.span: 預設為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: The default is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，使用以空格分隔的清單，以逗號分隔的 x 座標和 y 座標組來設定這個屬性。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], use a space-delimited list of comma-separated x-coordinate and y-coordinate pairs to set this attribute. 使用簡單標記法，也就是`x1,y1 x2,y2 ... xn,yn`。Use simple notation, that is, `x1,y1 x2,y2 ... xn,yn`. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立項目並設定使用程式碼的屬性。The following example shows how to create a element and set the property by using code. [!code-cpp[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolygon](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/CPP/ShapesProcedural.cpp#shapesproceduralpolygon)] [!code-csharp[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolygon](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/Csharp/ShapesProcedural.cs#shapesproceduralpolygon)] [!code-vb[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolygon](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/VisualBasic/ShapesProceduralVB.vb#shapesproceduralpolygon)]
